#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int a[1000001];

int main(){
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int ma = 0, ma2 = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
        ma = max(ma,a[i]);
    }
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
        if(a[i] != ma) ma2 = max(ma2,a[i]);
    }
    cout << ma2 << endl;
}
